actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to delay for 6 months the purchase and ownership of gold by citizens of the United States.

summary.text: Delays for six months (until July 1, 1975) the effective date of the Act allowing the purchase and ownership of gold by citizens of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to delay for 6 months the purchase and ownership of gold by citizens of the United States.
